title: Nasim Ali - Personal Portfolio v2.0
description: The latest iteration of my personal portfolio (this very site!). Built from the ground up using React, TypeScript, Next.js for SSR/SSG, Tailwind CSS for styling, and Framer Motion for smooth animations. Deployed on Vercel.

title: Advanced E-commerce Analytics Dashboard
description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for an e-commerce platform, providing insights into sales, customer behavior, and inventory management. Features real-time data visualization, custom reporting, and role-based access control. Backend built with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL; frontend with React and D3.js.

title: DevToolkit API Suite
description: A suite of microservices offering utility APIs for developers, including image processing, code snippet management, and data validation. Built with Java, Spring Boot, and deployed using Docker & Kubernetes on AWS. Secured with OAuth 2.0.

title: SyncTask Mobile App
description: A cross-platform task management application built with React Native and TypeScript. Features offline storage, cloud synchronization via Firebase, push notifications, and a clean, intuitive user interface.

title: Contributor to 'Awesome-Logger' Library
description: Contributed significantly to a popular open-source logging library by adding new features for structured logging, improving performance, and writing comprehensive documentation. Gained experience in collaborative open-source workflows.
